column5: I've collected the three pigment colors.
I've collected the three pigment colors.
By my hand as the Guardian King,
N-Noi, do you know this guy...!?
Nayuta briefly explained what had happened so far.
So this is what was to happen...#0E
They suddenly appeared in the Temple,
and I had no idea what was going on...#0E
If what you say is true,
then that is a strong possibility.#0E
However, even if we consider that man
to be truly the head of the Mythos...#0E
Who exactly was the man in the mask...?#0E
...That masked man seems to have been
acting as Zext's right hand man ever
We have no idea who he is, but
I haven't seen him ever since
I first came to Terra, though...
It seemed like he was at
is entrust the Temple in your care.#0E
We'll take the Temple back, I promise!
